channel.title: Who wants to help me make a unique gladiator skill
channel.description:
Ok,
I'm looking for someone [u]trustworthy[/u], and [u]reliable.[/u] I am looking for someone who can [u]understand[/u] I don't know much Java, but I will learn along the way. The things I want to do are:
[b]1:[/b] [i]Make it so for every gladiator kill, you get a certain amount of experience or in this case reputation points, and also getting a certain amnount of points depending on the reputation of your opponent (another human player). [/i]
[b]2:[/b] [i]I need to make it so that when the players get chosen to fight, they automatically wear their armour and can't change it - and they can't eat food either. They can't use prayer or tele away and the better their gladiator level the harder they are.[/i]
[b]3:[/b] [i]I would like to make a certain weapon snare the opponent without using a spell. The snare I'm planning should hit randomly but happens once to every person the player hits - from here, the player who gets snared gets dealt a random amount of damage above 10.[/i]
[b]4:[/b] [i]To make it so you need to be a certain gladiator lvl to wear the armour sets and when you go into battle you see an interface come up with choosing your armour set and you can't mix around the armour sets either.[/i]
[b]5:[/b] [i]I have an eventHandler set up so it teles some gladiators to the arena, and I need to work on it a bit more too.[/i]
[b]6:[/b] [i]Theres probably more, I just can't think of any more[/i]
Thanks

item.title: Who wants to help me make a unique gladiator skill
item.dc:creator: @elite_azn elite azn
item.description:
@elite_azn wrote:

Ok,

I’m looking for someone trustworthy, and reliable. I am looking for someone who can understand I don’t know much Java, but I will learn along the way. The things I want to do are:

1:
Make it so for every gladiator kill, you get a certain amount of experience or in this case reputation points, and also getting a certain amnount of points depending on the reputation of your opponent (another human player).

2:
I need to make it so that when the players get chosen to fight, they automatically wear their armour and can’t change it - and they can’t eat food either. They can’t use prayer or tele away and the better their gladiator level the harder they are.

3:
I would like to make a certain weapon snare the opponent without using a spell. The snare I’m planning should hit randomly but happens once to every person the player hits - from here, the player who gets snared gets dealt a random amount of damage above 10.

4:
To make it so you need to be a certain gladiator lvl to wear the armour sets and when you go into battle you see an interface come up with choosing your armour set and you can’t mix around the armour sets either.

5:
I have an eventHandler set up so it teles some gladiators to the arena, and I need to work on it a bit more too.

6:
Theres probably more, I just can’t think of any more

Thanks

Read full topic
